notes: “Far Beyond the Stars,” Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, season 6, episode 13, aired February 11, 1998.
Roberta Pearson and Máire Messenger Davies, Star Trek and American Television (Berkeley: University of California Press, 2014).
“Where No Man Has Gone Before,” Star Trek: The Original Series, season 1, episode 3, aired September 22, 1966.
“Encounter at Farpoint,” Star Trek: The Next Generation, season 1, episode 1, aired September 28, 1987.

“New Worlds” conjures this designation of the Americas from Amerigo Vespucci’s 1503 letter. See José Rabasa, Inventing America: Spanish Historiography and the Formation of Eurocentrism (Norman, OK: University of Oklahoma Press, 1993).

Mark P. Lagon, ‘We Owe It to Them to Interfere:’ _Star Trek _and U.S. Statecraft in the 1960s and the 1990s.” In Political Science Fiction, edited by Donald M. Hassler and Clyde Wilcox, 234-250 (Columbia, SC: University of South Carolina Press, 1997).
Space and Time: Essays on Visions of History in Science Fiction and Fantasy Television, edited by David C. Wright, Jr. and Allan W. Austin (Jefferson, NC: McFarland, 2010).
The Essential Science Fiction Television Reader, edited by J.P. Telotte (Lexington, Kentucky: The University Press of Kentucky, 2008).
Enterprise Zones: Critical Positions on Star Trek, edited by Taylor Harrison, Sarah Projansky, Kent A. Ono, and Elyce Rae Helford (Boulder: Westview Press, 1996).
Steve Russell, “The Jurisprudence of Colonialism.” Legal Studies Forum 25 (2001): 605-617.
Patricia Seed, Ceremonies of Possession in Europe’s Conquest of the New World, 1492-1640 (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1995).
Lynette Russell and Nathan Wolski, “Beyond the Final Frontier: Star Trek, the Borg and the Post-colonial,” _Intensities: The Journal of Cult Media _1 (2001).

Jeffrey Weinstock, “Freaks in Space: ‘Extraterrestrialism’ and ‘Deep-Space Multiculturalism,’” in Freakery: Cultural Spectacles of the Extraordinary Body, edited by Rosemarie Garland Thomson (New York: New York University Press, 1996), pp. 327-337.
“The Gift,” Star Trek: Voyager, season 4, episode 2, aired September 10, 1997.
“Scorpion,” Star Trek: Voyager, season 3, episode 26, aired May 21, 1997.
“Trials and Tribble-ations,” Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, season 5, episode 6, aired November 4, 1996.
“Faces,” Star Trek: Voyager, season 1, episode 14, aired May 8, 1995.
